name: Throw A Cube
description:
=====DISCLAMER=====

This game is still in development and will have updates/levels/new mechanics (If I Am Creative Enough).

=====DISCLAMER=====

A Game Where You Can Throw Some Red Cubes And Pass A Few Minutes Of Time Easily.

=====STORY=====

you are cool guy and then you can suddenly move red cubes and have fun.

=====STORY=====

Enjoy!
